name: Duel!
description:
Duel is a simple turn-based strategy game where you decide to put it all on the line or make a bet to increase your chances of winning.

Story Mode - Follow a mysterious wanderer as he tries to get a drink in the small town of Snakebite Gulch.

Endless Mode - Fight as many rival cowboys, outlaws, or sheriffs until its your turn to head to the coffin.
